transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan sir main ek cheez jaanna chahta hu jaise ye inquiries aati hai by leads aati hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To sir isme jaise hum kuch dekhte hai details vagera usme jaise quantity aa rahi hai 2000 piece ki.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur hum uski quantity dekh ke us by lead ko buy kar lete hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To uske baad pata chalta hai ki usko ek hi piece chahiye.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To is tarah ki agar sir by leads aayengi to hum karenge kya uska.
Executive: Okay sir aap pehle mujhe ye bataye aap kaun si company se baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Main sir Seleron se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Seleron.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Samir ji baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Main Samir baat kar raha hu haan ji. Ji ji ji haan to aap keh rahe hai ki specifications jo hai ya usme jo quantity mention hai wo mismatch hai aisa aap bata rahe hai.
Executive: Likh rahe hai wo 2000 piece aur chahiye ek piece.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Okay. To sir aap aapke paas ye jo lead aayi thi matlab wo by default aapko show hui thi ya aapne kuch filters vagera apply kiye the.
Customer: Nahi maine koi filter nahi apply kara usme apne aap hi show aaya jab dekhte hai to waha pe aa jata hai quantity wali cheeze to fir unko dekh ke hum utha lete hai aur aisa ye aaj nahi aise hi ho raha hai jo bhi main quantity wala order uthata hu usme mostly hota kya hai ke wahi hota hai usko ek hi piece chahiye hota hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir main samajh gaya ab dekhiye sir aapne aapko service use kiye abhi char panch mahine hue okay aur ye aapki samasya from the very beginning ye aap bata rahe hai ki chali aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Okay to sir aapne kuch filters vagera apply karke dekha hai actually hota kya hai jaise aap koi filter apply karte hai jaise bulk wali ya GST wali ya business type ki usme jaise leads aap waha se consume karenge aapka ek purchasing behavior ban jata hai theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Fir jis hisab ki leads aap abhi un filters ko use karenge.
Customer: Sir ek second mein. Haan haan sir bataiye ek call aa raha tha usme meeting mein.
Executive: Ji ji. Koi important call aa raha hai. Haan sir. To main ye bata raha tha ki jaise aapke paas koi aap filters apply karke koi leads vagera purchase karte hai to usko aap frequently kuch dino ko kuch dino ke liye wo pattern follow kijiye fir aapka ek purchasing behavior ban jayega fir aapko us hisab se leads aane lagengi main aapko isliye filter suggest kar raha hu GST ya bulk wali kyuki waha se aapko ek acha response milega aise dikkate aapko waha nahi dikhengi.
Executive: Theek hai kyuki GST GST wali hoti hai to jaise aap ek supplier hai aap apna product bech rahe hai IndiaMART mein hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapke products aapke product line mein related koi dusre bhi competitors honge jinko aapke product mein requirement hogi ki mujhe ye aage resell karna hai ya something like this.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To unhone apni requirement post ki hai to waha aapko ek acha response milega.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Wo bahut sari cheeze aisi hoti hai jaise for perspective prospecting purpose ke liye bhi log inquiries bhejte hai aapke paas ya IndiaMART ke paas koi inquiry aati hai to aapke paas bhej dete hai taki ho sakta hai ki aapka waha baat ban jaye.
Customer: Wo baat to theek hai wo baat to theek hai bhai par ek to main jo leads hai wo uthata hi kam hu.
Executive: Dekhiye sir aap leads kam uthate hai aap kam uthate hai to main aapko yahi suggest karunga ki kam utha rahe hai koi baat nahi hai aap ek baar apna purchasing behavior bana lijiye wo jo maine filter aapko suggest kiye hai aap usko ek baar apply karke dekhiye aapko for sure changes and improvement dekhne ko milenge.
Customer: Main filter laga ke check karu ji aur uske baad main apna jo bhi mujhe quantity wali chahiye hoti hai main unko uthau to ye behavior set ho jayega aise hi aap bol rahe hai na.
Executive: Exactly wahi hai jaise hum log youtube pe kuch search karte hai to waise suggestions aane lagte hai videos mein.
Customer: Nahi wo main jaanta hu wo main jaanta hu bahut achi tarah. Haan wahi algorithm yaha pe bhi hai sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Ji to ek baar aap usko try karke dekhiye for sure aapko improvement milega.
Customer: Ye mujhe ek cheez bataiye par ye aati kyu hai is tarah ki kyuki by leads bahut keemti hoti hai.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir.
Customer: Uska hum paisa dete hai to is tarah ki cheeze aa kyu rahi hai.
Executive: Sir prospecting.
Customer: Uska.
Executive: Prospecting purpose se hota hai ki for example agar aapke aapne us by lead ko consume kara theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bhale hi aapke liye ek piece ki requirement ho lekin wo aapko baar baar order dene lage yaani ki aise products bhi hote hai market mein jinka order value jyada hota hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To unhone agar ek ek piece ka bhi order diya to is mahine diya fir agle mahine de rahe hai fir agle mahine de rahe hai to wo aapke repeat orders ban jate hai.
Executive: To waha se aapko ek constant customer ban jata hai to us us purpose se bhi IndiaMART aapko wo waisi leads provide karta hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai chaliye dekhte hai but in cheezo ko aap rectify kariye na.
Executive: Bilkul sir kaam chal raha hai aap pehle sir main ek aur cheez aapko bata deta hu pehle kya hota tha ki ek lead pe multiple aapke competitors us pe connect kar sakte the lekin aaj ki date mein IndiaMART ne usko reduce kar diya hai aapke competitor ko per lead pe ek lead pe ab sirf paanch aapke aapko include karke char aur aapke competitors us pe connect kar sakte hai taki aapka competition kam ho to ye sari cheeze improve ho rahi hai gradually aur bhi cheeze improve hongi aur aapko update mil jayega.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai theek hai.
Executive: One more thing sir aapke paas is call ke baad na ek feedback ka mail aayega to usme please sir positive feedback de dijiyega mail hi rahega sir.
Customer: Okay. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Mismatch in quantity mentioned in buyleads.

- Customer often needs only one piece.



Resolution:

- Suggested using filters for better leads.

- Explained prospecting purpose of leads.

- Mentioned reduced competitor connections per lead.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try using filters.

- Executive requested positive feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, quantity, prospecting, competitors
